name: places/ChIJPZDJNLJZwokRRFe5SSB9rGM
formattedAddress: 282 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 282 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: The shampoo alone is worth the visit. They take their time washing your hair and massaging the scalp, it is so relaxing and therapeutic. I've seen several hairstylists and every one of them has done an excellent job. I get long layers and after they are done, my hair cascades naturally, they are the only salon that has been able to get it right. Their prices are also reasonable for NYC and less than most other salons. Highly recommend seeing any hairstylist here, especially if you have long hair. They do a beautiful job.

originalText.text:
I went to Class Hair for a half head of highlights and a haircut.  Alma did a wonderful job!  The salon had a great atmosphere, was clean and everyone was very friendly.

I'm not a fan of having to spend 6 hours in the salon, so I appreciated that the highlights, shampoo, hair mask, head massage (and a wonderful one at that!), cut and style only took about 3 hours.

After a day or two, I did realize that I wished there were a few more highlights in a specific section.  Alma got me back in the chair almost immediately and fixed the issues with swiftness and kindness!

My only minor critique is that they up-charged me for a couple of things, but they didn't inform me until checkout.  I understand some things are an extra "add on", but I just would've appreciated a heads up in the moment.

But overall it was a wonderful experience!  Alma was fantastic and Rose is a shampoo/head massage magician.  Seriously, I'm probably going to stop getting massages, and just go to Class Hair for a shampoo and blowout.

originalText.text:
My second time doing my hair there and I recommend it to everyone. Alma did my ashy highlights with such care and just how I wanted it. Beside the fact that she is so sweet, Alma asks time to time if you have any questions and she gives her professional recommendations when needed. She gave my hair a blow dry after the color and it is still looks fresh and perfect on the second day. I am so happy with this hair salon and compare to the other salons on the area the prices are much more affordable.
Thank you Alma and Hair by Class.

originalText.text: Managed to book a last minute appointment for a blow dry here on a busy Saturday morning - super friendly and accommodating. I also requested a scalp massage from the hair-washer and she was great. Blow dry result was fantastic and just what I asked for - only had to remind for product/heat protection to be added. Would return!

text.text: Managed to book a last minute appointment for a blow dry here on a busy Saturday morning - super friendly and accommodating. I also requested a scalp massage from the hair-washer and she was great. Blow dry result was fantastic and just what I asked for - only had to remind for product/heat protection to be added. Would return!

originalText.text: I love this beautiful hair salon! not only is it clean and bright, but the staff are all so very kind and pleasant. What a joy it is to go there. I must say that I originally went there to see Tatiana. She is the most dependable, consistent, talented hair stylist I've ever been to. Not only is she a great stylist but she is always friendly and sweet. It is a pleasure getting my hair cut there and I can trust Tatiana to give the best haircut that always grows in so beautifully! Kudos to Alma and her beautiful salon and staff!
